title: Fancy scripty font with extra swashes, etc
content:
Enamored with this, and I blame Pinterest. Having a really hard time ID'ing because of all the extra (but oh-s0-pretty) swashes and such. Thank you in advance!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [pamela font.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015115356/http:/typophile.com/files/pamela%20font.jpg) | 10.2 KB |
author: smarterthanismell

comments.content: if you really like swashes and choices, check [Samantha Script](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015115356/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/laura-worthington/samantha-upright-script/). loads of extra glyphs, if you have software that can manage opentype.
That is a lovely and verrrrry similar option! Thank you!
